responses.rationale: The segment describes a negative fact (rising infections) but does not state a capability or preparedness measure.
The segment describes a vulnerability, not a capability or preparedness measure.
The segment describes a challenge and potential risk, not a capability or preparedness measure.
The segment describes a challenge and vulnerability, not a capability or preparedness measure.
The segment states officials are "still working closely to understand the breadth" which describes a response/investigation measure.
The segment describes samples being "tested" and a "federal order requiring dairy cow testing" which are surveillance/response measures.
The segment describes attention being paid, not a concrete capability or preparedness measure.
The segment mentions the creation of the "National Animal Disease Preparedness and Response Program".
The segment states the "program [National Animal Disease Preparedness and Response Program] would be reauthorized".
The segment states federal officials "have been 'good partners' in the avian influenza response".
